explanation: [0-0] In front of a black background, a man sits at a purple table with various items on it, including a wooden block, a plastic cup, a metal musical instrument, a bucket of water, etc. The man wears headphones and smiles. He holds a drumstick in his left hand and a wooden board in his right hand. Above the man is a screen displaying a metal furnace and a stove.

[0-2] Next, the man strikes the wooden block with the red board as a fire ignites on the stove in the screen. Subsequently, two hands appear on the screen, one holding a chicken and the other using a knife to cut off a chicken leg.

[2-6] Then, two knives appear on the screen, chopping meat with the back of the blades. Meanwhile, the man holds a colorful ball, and then strikes the wooden block on the table with the drumstick in his left hand.
